content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":196552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この人……体が再生してる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This person... his body is regenerating...\""},{"lineNumber":196553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それじゃあ、まさか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, could it be that...\""},{"lineNumber":196554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゲイマルクさんって、ずっとこうやって……","translatedEnglishLine":"Sir Geimark has been like this all along...\""},{"lineNumber":196555,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ろして……くれ……』","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kill... me...\""},{"lineNumber":196556,"originalJapaneseLine":"リセットは勇者ゲイマルクに近づくと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset approached the hero Geimark,"},{"lineNumber":196557,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頬に優しく触れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and gently touched his cheek."},{"lineNumber":196558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":196559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、おい、くせーぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey, you stink.\""},{"lineNumber":196560,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ころして、くれ……だれか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kill me... someone...\""},{"lineNumber":196561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おれを……ころして、くれ……』","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill me... please...\""},{"lineNumber":196562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この人……死にたがってる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This person... wants to die...\""},{"lineNumber":196563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あっ、そういえば前に会ったときに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, oh, by the way, when we met before,"},{"lineNumber":196564,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おら達聞きましただ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"we heard this!\""},{"lineNumber":196565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしも、今も意識が残っているなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If he still retains consciousness now,"},{"lineNumber":196566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼は全身の激痛と痒みに苦しんでる筈だって」","translatedEnglishLine":"he must be suffering from intense pain and itching all over his body.\""},{"lineNumber":196567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、きっと……そうだと思う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I'm sure... that's true...\""},{"lineNumber":196568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お姉ちゃん……どうにか出来ないのかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sister... can't you do something...?\""},{"lineNumber":196569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分からないわね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know...,"},{"lineNumber":196570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そもそもどうして死なないのかも分からないのに","translatedEnglishLine":"and we don't even know why he won't die in the first place.\""},{"lineNumber":196571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この人は……放っておくしかないわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's nothing we can do but leave him alone...\""},{"lineNumber":196572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":196573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":196574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうだな、＜エール＞……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right, <Yell>...\""},{"lineNumber":196575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いくらなんでもあんまりだよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No matter how you look at it, this is just too much...\""},{"lineNumber":196576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死なせてやれたらいいんだろうけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wish we could just let him die...\""},{"lineNumber":196577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念だが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unfortunately...\""},{"lineNumber":196578,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今の僕達には手立てがないね……","translatedEnglishLine":"there's nothing we can do right now...\""},{"lineNumber":196579,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時――","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment—"},{"lineNumber":196580,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゲイマルクが一瞬、光を放つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Geimark emitted a brief light."},{"lineNumber":196581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、なになに！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what is that!?\""},{"lineNumber":196582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、おいっ、見ろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, hey, look!\""},{"lineNumber":196583,"originalJapaneseLine":"それまで再生を行っていたゲイマルクの体が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The body of Geimark, which had been regenerating until then,"},{"lineNumber":196584,"originalJapaneseLine":"また改めて消えていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"began disappearing again."},{"lineNumber":196585,"originalJapaneseLine":"『お、お……死ねる……死ぬ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I... can die... I will die...\""},{"lineNumber":196586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、お、お、お、お……』","translatedEnglishLine":"I, I, I, I, I...\""},{"lineNumber":196587,"originalJapaneseLine":"『これ、は……ああっ……』","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is... ah...\""},{"lineNumber":196588,"originalJapaneseLine":"『あたた、かい……』","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Warm...\""},{"lineNumber":196589,"originalJapaneseLine":"『……こんなもの……ずっと、知ら……な……』","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Something like this... I've never known...\""},{"lineNumber":196590,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ぁぁぁあぁぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaahhh...\""},{"lineNumber":196591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あり、が、とう……ありが、とう……』","translatedEnglishLine":"Tha-thank you... tha-thank you...\""},{"lineNumber":196592,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then—"},{"lineNumber":196593,"originalJapaneseLine":"勇者ゲイマルクは完璧に消滅した。","translatedEnglishLine":"The hero Geimark completely vanished."},{"lineNumber":196594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに、今の……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What was that just now...?\""},{"lineNumber":196595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセット、何かした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reset, did you do something?\""},{"lineNumber":196596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、うぅん、私は何も！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, no, I didn't do anything!?\""},{"lineNumber":196597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大方、もう再生回数の残機がなかった、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Most likely, his extra lives for regeneration were all used up,"},{"lineNumber":196598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みたいなところだろーよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"something like that.\""},{"lineNumber":196599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうなのかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-Is that really the case...?\""},{"lineNumber":196600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別に構う必要もねーんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's no need to worry about it."},{"lineNumber":196601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's get going.\""},{"lineNumber":196602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、まあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-well...\""},{"lineNumber":196603,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これであの勇者が楽になったんだったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If that means the hero is now relieved,"},{"lineNumber":196604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　良かった、よな」","translatedEnglishLine":"then that's good, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":196605,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は少し不思議に思ったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"You all felt a little curious, but"},{"lineNumber":196606,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここにいても仕方ないかと、","translatedEnglishLine":"decided there was no point staying here,"},{"lineNumber":196607,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山を登り始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and began climbing Mount Shoryu."},{"lineNumber":196608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念だが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's unfortunate, but...\""},{"lineNumber":196609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今の僕達には手立てがないね……","translatedEnglishLine":"there's nothing we can do right now...\""},{"lineNumber":196610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな、もう行こう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, let's go already."},{"lineNumber":196611,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このままここにいても仕方ない」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no point in staying here like this.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゲイマルクさんって、ずっとこうやって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sir Geimark has been like this all along..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットは勇者ゲイマルクに近づくと、
その頬に優しく触れる。
「あ、あっ、そういえば前に会ったときに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, oh, by the way, when we met before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしも、今も意識が残っているなら、
彼は全身の激痛と痒みに苦しんでる筈だって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he must be suffering from intense pain and itching all over his body."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お姉ちゃん……どうにか出来ないのかな……」
そもそもどうして死なないのかも分からないのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we don't even know why he won't die in the first place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この人は……放っておくしかないわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's nothing we can do but leave him alone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いくらなんでもあんまりだよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how you look at it, this is just too much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死なせてやれたらいいんだろうけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wish we could just let him die..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の僕達には手立てがないね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's nothing we can do right now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゲイマルクが一瞬、光を放つ。
それまで再生を行っていたゲイマルクの体が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The body of Geimark, which had been regenerating until then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また改めて消えていく。
あり、が、とう……ありが、とう……』
勇者ゲイマルクは完璧に消滅した。
「大方、もう再生回数の残機がなかった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Most likely, his extra lives for regeneration were all used up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みたいなところだろーよ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no need to worry about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これであの勇者が楽になったんだったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that means the hero is now relieved,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は少し不思議に思ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all felt a little curious, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにいても仕方ないかと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: decided there was no point staying here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の僕達には手立てがないね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's nothing we can do right now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままここにいても仕方ない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no point in staying here like this."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゲイマルクさんって、ずっとこうやって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sir Geimark has been like this all along..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットは勇者ゲイマルクに近づくと、
その頬に優しく触れる。
「あ、あっ、そういえば前に会ったときに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, oh, by the way, when we met before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしも、今も意識が残っているなら、
彼は全身の激痛と痒みに苦しんでる筈だって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he must be suffering from intense pain and itching all over his body."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お姉ちゃん……どうにか出来ないのかな……」
そもそもどうして死なないのかも分からないのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we don't even know why he won't die in the first place."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この人は……放っておくしかないわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's nothing we can do but leave him alone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いくらなんでもあんまりだよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how you look at it, this is just too much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死なせてやれたらいいんだろうけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wish we could just let him die..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の僕達には手立てがないね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's nothing we can do right now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゲイマルクが一瞬、光を放つ。
それまで再生を行っていたゲイマルクの体が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The body of Geimark, which had been regenerating until then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また改めて消えていく。
あり、が、とう……ありが、とう……』
勇者ゲイマルクは完璧に消滅した。
「大方、もう再生回数の残機がなかった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Most likely, his extra lives for regeneration were all used up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みたいなところだろーよ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's no need to worry about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これであの勇者が楽になったんだったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that means the hero is now relieved,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は少し不思議に思ったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all felt a little curious, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにいても仕方ないかと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: decided there was no point staying here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の僕達には手立てがないね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's nothing we can do right now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままここにいても仕方ない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no point in staying here like this."
